note.p: Rancher. Son of Thomas Bridges. Established Viamonte ranch, Argentina, 1902. Served in the British Army from around 1914. Rancher in Southern Rhodesia, 1920–2. Ranch manager at River Baker, Aysén, Chile, 1923.
British families in southern Patagonia, https://patbrit.org/bil/supp/a0105.htm (accessed 29 August 2019)
